name: BEEN HERE FOR TOO LONG
description:
An 18-page illustrated sequence turned into a zine. Featuring characters and themes related to SUPERPOSE-- cycles, recurrence, and breaking them.

inspired by Dammit by the band blink-182 as covered by Josiah Hughes, a guy whose own collaborative project (blink-155) helped reinvigorate my approach not just to art, but to interests and hobbies generally.
